===Etymology===
From the addition of {{zh-l|仙|[[Taoist]] [[immortal]]}} to the earlier {{zh-l|蓬萊島|[[Penglai Island]]}} to distinguish it from [[Formosa]], an actual island which had gained that name as a poetic epithet
